alert.note: Alert for Goodhue (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 2:32PM CST until January 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Minnesota and west central Wisconsin. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The track of the system is still fairly uncertain, thus any shifts to the west/east will have an impact on expected snow totals.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
